name: Angles Does Some SICK Band Jams
name_original: Angles Does Some SICK Band Jams
description:
Oh no! 
Angles' bandmates are sick and yet the concert must go on!
Help Angles find temp bandmates for the party tonight...

made by
KILLIAN NG & ONION

CONTROLS:
aswd/arrow keys - move
space bar - jump
enter/return key - interact

DIVISION OF WORK:
Killian: Coding and assembling in Unity, background layouts
Onion: Character and background art, narrative text and scripting in Yarn Spinner

And just for fun:

 

PS. The mac and linux versions are not really tested so I'm very sorry if they don't work!
PPS. The game has no sound/music! Very sorry about that but ran out of available time to complete that. Maybe it will be updated in the future but no promises :'|
